BEP: Blocks voor het programmeren van Bouw je BEP met 4tronix Servobit I2C 16-Servo Driver Board
BEP.convertRGB:
Zet RGB waardes om naar kleur nummer
* @param red Red value of the LED (0 to 255)
BEP.ledBrightness: Stel de helderheid in van de LED
BEP.ledBrightness|param|brightness: a measure of LED brightness in 0-255. eg: 40
BEP.servoWrite:
sets the requested servo to the reguested angle.
if the PCA has not yet been initialised calls the initialisation routine
* @param Servo Which servo to set
BEP.servoWrite|param|position: the angle to set the servo to
BEP.setLedColor: Sets the status LED to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b).
BEP.startFlash|param|delay: time in ms for each flash, eg: 100,50,200,500
